Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 23/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
